itemLabel: Beatrix Beauclerk, Duchess of St Albans

wikipedia_page.main: Beatrix Frances Beauclerk, Duchess of St Albans, Marchioness of Waterford, GBE, DGStJ (25 March 1877 – 5 August 1953), born Lady Beatrix Frances Petty-FitzMaurice, was a member of the Anglo-Irish aristocracy, both by birth and through her two marriages.

response: *Beatrix Beauclerk, Duchess of St Albans (1877–1953), English peer
